doc.title: 40 Love
doc.plot: When BRUCE CHANG, a young, hip African "Asian" American Tennis Pro arrives at Morning Wood Country Club and rocks the perfect world of the older hunk-of-a-Tennis Pro, RICHARD "DICK" WHEAD, hilarity ensues as the rivals compete over everything from job rank to the love of Richard's only daughter; however, when the two must join forces to take down their neighboring country-club nemesis, the dynamic duo learns that life isn't just about how you play the game, it's also about whether you win or lose.
